Name: (Jean Carlos Pereira da Silva)
Source ref: tgeu/1 May 2011/(Jean Carlos Pereira da Silva)
Description:
The victim was stabbed to death in the back with a knife in front of a bar. According to the police various persons had been in the bar drinking and after the victim stole 10 reais from a man there was a short discussion. After several hours, the victim left towards home and José Ronaldo de Almeida, 32, who had been waiting in a thicket reportedly committed the crime. The perpetrator fled the scene.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: CNews, online portal, 2.5.2011

Name: Preta Gil (Andrey) Barbosa
Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Blog do Pablo, blog, 23.06.2011; Grupo 28 de Junho, LGBT group/Eugenhio 28, blog, 20.06.2011

Name: Barbara (Abraham Lopez Lezama)
Description:
The victim was a sex worker and was killed in her own apartment by a client who beat her with a shoe, strangled her and gave her a deadly blow on the head. She was found dead by a friend, also a travesti, who informed the authorities. The perpetrator fled the apartment but has been identified by the police.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: E- consulta, online portal/Foto Agencia Enfoque, 1.5.2011, En Interiores,

Name: Naomi (Leonel Carmona Adames)
Description:
Naomi's body was found in a pool of blood, with a 5 gallon gas container standing next to her head.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Jancavacs, online portal, 6.5.2011

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The vicitm's body was found with gunshots in the head and leg on Rua Servidão Dois. It is assumed that the killing happened in a different location.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Hoje em Dia, online portal, 11.05.2011

Name: (Felipe Roberto) de Freitas Silva
Source ref: tgeu/12 May 2011/(Felipe Roberto) de Freitas Silva
Description:
According to the police, the victim was at home when two men came in order to kill the victim. The victim, according to the report, went to get a two year-old child so that the men would not shoot, but they shot nonetheless, injuring the child as well as her grandmother who tried to protect the child, and killing the victim. Due to information given by the victim's father and further reports, the police suspect a relation to drug trafficking.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Record Minas, online portal, 12.05.2011

Name: Luisa Nicol (Luis Alberto) Valera
Description:
Luisa's alleged murderers were arrested. They belong to a gang that exploits trans and gay sex workers.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Venezuela Diversa, 14.05.2011

Name: Name Unknown
Description: ‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Folha de Pernambuco, online portal, 18.05.11

Name: Mónica Elizondo
Description:
Mónica was shot while riding on a bus by MS-13 gang members.

She was a close friend of [Camila Díaz Córdova](https://tdor.translivesmatter.info/reports/2019/02/03/camila-diaz-cordova-aurora_soyapango-san-salvador-el-salvador_cb28fc3b), who died after being beaten by police officers on 30th January 2019.

> Her friend Mónica, 35, wanted the same. They had already threatened her and shot her house. Monica decided to leave the house in the Montreal neighborhood. On May 20, 2011 she returned to the house, wanting to clean and check that it was in order. She was killed while travelling inside Route 47. According to police accounts, alleged gang members of the Mara Salvatrucha (MS-13), the same ones who had threatened her, shot her several times.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; Prensa Libre, online portal, 24.5.2011

http://agenciapresentes.org/2019/12/05/la-ultima-noche-de-camila-trans-perseguida-por-pandillas-y-asesinada-por-la-policia/

Name: Paloma
Description:
Paloma was a young trans woman who was clubbed to death in the bathroom of a construction site on Rua Landulfo Alves.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Journal Atual, online portal, 5.08.2011

Name: (Milda Rusel Aguilar Donis)
Description:
The victim was shot as several persons attacked a group standing in front of a bar. A woman, the bar owner, was also killed. Another man was injured.

TvT partner organization TV Mex - Travestis Mexico, Summary 2011; La Pagina online portal, 21.5.2011

Name: Alison Pereira Cabral dos Anjos ("Camile")
Source ref: tgeu/tgeu/26 May 2011/Alison Pereira Cabral dos Anjos (Camile)
Description:
Camila was shot by a client on Rua Doutor Edgard Teotônio Santana at around 8.30 pm. She reportedly did not have change to give him when he paid and owed him 10 reais (10 R$) as a result.

The client later came back with a gun and shot her at least seven times. A witness reported the license plate of the motorcycle on which the perpetrator fled.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: estadao/Sao Paulo, online portal, 27.5.2011

https://recordtv.r7.com/sp-no-ar/videos/travesti-morre-apos-briga-com-cliente-por-causa-de-r-10-22102018

Name: Alicinha da Cruz
Description:
Alicinha's body was found in a stream in a state of decay with marks of strangling on the neck in the stream Gumita.

Her body had also been dragged by a car and then been thrown into a sewer. The police investigated on the basis that the motive may have been homophobia and drug-related vengeance, relating the case to the murder of [Mailda dos Santos](https://tdor.translivesmatter.info/reports/2011/06/08/mailda-dos-santos-maria-do-bairro_lagoa-encantada-cuiaba-mato-grosso-brazil_23f5eb73), which took place on 8th June 2011 in the same area of Cuiaba.

> On Saturday, [deadname] was found in the Gumita stream with a rope around her neck. Investigations indicate that she was killed by strangulation and dragged for several meters before being was thrown into the stream. The corpse was located late Saturday morning in a place that was difficult to access, in the Três Lagoas neighborhood in Cuiabá. 

On 31st June 2020, four men were killed in a confrontation with Military Police. One of them was suspected to have been responsible for the murder of both Alicinha and [Mailda dos Santos](https://tdor.translivesmatter.info/reports/2011/06/08/mailda-dos-santos-maria-do-bairro_lagoa-encantada-cuiaba-mato-grosso-brazil_23f5eb73).

> One of the four killed in confrontation with the Mobile Tactical Ostensive Rounds Battalion (Rotam), yesterday afternoon (31) on MT-351, in Estrada de Manso, Cleberson Rodrigo, 33, was arrested in September 2011, by the Civil Police, for involvement in the homicide of two [trans women] due to drug debt. At the time he was 23 years old, and was known for trafficking in the CPA region. The investigations pointed out that debt was not the only motivation for the crimes, "but it is as if these people were going to the chase, expressing a prejudice existing in them, hence the explanation for the torture and cruelty of the crimes", says an excerpt from the complaint.

The body of the first victim, [deadname] da Cruz, 19, was found on May 28 of that year, inside a stream, on the border bridge of the Três Lagoas neighborhood with Vila Rosa, in Cuiabá, asphyxiated with a rope. Ten days later, on June 8, the [trans woman] Mailda dos Santos Silva, 33, was murdered in a similarly cruel fashion. Her body was found in the CPA III neighborhood, at the back of Lagoa Encantada.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Gay 1 online portal, 30.5.11, 14.6.2011

https://www.rdnews.com.br/policia/um-dos-4-mortos-em-confronto-com-a-pm-tem-2-homicidios-de-gays-na-ficha-policial/130242

https://www.gazetadigital.com.br/editorias/policia/criminosos-mortos-em-confronto-com-rotam-so-identificados/621425

https://www.olhardireto.com.br/noticias/exibir.asp?id=472645&noticia=criminoso-morto-no-manso-tinha-envolvimento-no-assassinato-de-duas-travestis&edicao=1

http://diariodecuiaba.com.br/policia/travesti-pode-ser-alvo-do-trafico/393484

Name: (Roberto Confessor da Silva)
Description:
The victim was killed with two gunshots in the early morning when returning home. According to locals, the alleged perpetrator had a sexual relationship with the victim.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Paraiba News, online portal, 18.10.2011

Name: (Alexandre dos Anjos)
Description:
The victim's body was found naked with a piece of wood next to it that had been used to kill the victim.

‘Transrespect versus Transphobia Worldwide’ research project: Jorge Quixabeira, online portal, 31.05.2011

Name: Levinha
Description:
According to Grupo Gay da Bahia, the murder was based on 'homophobia'.

TvT partner organization: Grupo Gay da Bahia (Tabelas 2011)
